members.name: maxHeight
members.description: Sets the max height of the panel's body

members.name: slug
members.description: Uniquely identifies a panel for accessibility purposes

events.description: Fires when a panel is opened

events.description: Fires when a panel is closed

members.description: Support for closing all inactive panels when one is opened

members.name: currentPanel
members.description: The index value for the most recently opened panel

members.name: handleMouseOver
members.description: Sets hover to true onMouseOver

members.name: handleMouseOut
members.description: Sets hover to false onMouseOut

members.name: handleClick
members.description: Handles click behavior

members.name: handleBlur

members.name: type
members.description:
Controls the type of button
standard | text | circle | rounded | pill

members.name: active
members.description: Determines whether or not the button is active

members.name: hover
members.description: Is true when the button is hovered

members.name: focused
members.description: Is true when the button is focused

members.name: link
members.description: The url a button should link too

members.name: outlined
members.description: Outline style for a button

members.name: disabled
members.description: Determines whether not a button is disabled

members.name: top
members.description: The elements top position in pixels.

members.name: left
members.description: The element's left position in pixels.

members.name: measure
members.description:
If set to true, will measure the width and height
of the element's content and apply it to the host element.

members.name: memory
members.description: A unique identifier used to store the element's position in local storage.

members.name: opened
members.description: Determines if the drawer is opened or not.

members.name: effect
members.description:
The animation effect for opening and closing the drawer.
Values include: (slide | reveal | push | scale)

members.name: side
members.description:
Allows you to control which side the drawer opens from.
Values include: (left | right | top | bottom)

members.name: overlay
members.description: Adds a overlay over the content section of the Drawer when opened

Allows you to control which side the drawer opens from.

members.name: set
members.description:
The sprite map from an open source project that an icon belongs too.
Values include:
(bootstrap | font-awesome-brand | font-awesome-regular | font-awesome-solid)

members.name: icon
members.description: The name of the icon to reference.

members.name: size
members.description: The width and height of the icon in pixels.

members.name: opened
members.description: Determines whether or not the popover displays.

members.name: effect
members.description:
The opening and closing effect of the popover. Is optional.
Values include:
(fade | scale | slide | fall | flip horizontal | flip vertical | sign | super scaled)

members.name: position
members.description:
Determines the placement of the popover.
Values include: (top | right | bottom | left)

members.name: tooltip
members.description: Adds a built in tooltip to the popover.

members.name: customTooltip
members.description:
Adds a custom tooltip to the popover.
Use the custom-tooltip slot to specify the custom tooltip.

members.name: fireOn
members.description:
Controls how the trigger should activate the popover.
Values include: (click | hover)

members.name: clickOutside
members.description: Allows the popover to be closed by clicking outside of its content.

members.name: smart
members.description: Intelligently positions the popover.

members.name: activeSlide
members.description: The index number for the current slide.

members.description: The transition effect type.

members.name: rotationSpeed
members.description: How fast, in seconds, each slide lasts. Stop the rotator with 0.

members.description: The width of the rotator block.

members.description: The height of the rotator block.

members.name: element
members.description: A DOM element that establishes the context of scrolling.

members.name: target
members.description:
A DOM element that represents the destination of the scroll link.
If no target is specified it will default to the top of the page.

members.name: xOffset
members.description: Allows the horizontal scrolling to stop short of the given value.

members.name: yOffset
members.description: Allows the vertical scrolling to stop short of the given value.

attributes.name: element
attributes.description: A DOM element that establishes the context of scrolling.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description:
A DOM element that represents the destination of the scroll link.
If no target is specified it will default to the top of the page.

attributes.name: x-offset
attributes.description: Allows the horizontal scrolling to stop short of the given value.

attributes.name: y-offset
attributes.description: Allows the vertical scrolling to stop short of the given value.

members.name: keyCodes
members.default:
{
      ENTER: 13,
      SPACE: 32,
      HOME: 36,
      END: 35,
      RIGHT: 39,
      LEFT: 37,
    }
